p: Indeed, only 7 coronaviruses have infected humans till now, SARS-CoV2 included. These viruses are indicated as HCoVs (human coronaviruses) and can be divided into four different lineages based on their genomic characterization. Alpha coronaviruses, including the strains 229E and NL63; beta coronaviruses lineage A, including strains OC43 and HKU1; beta coronaviruses lineage B, representing SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2; beta coronaviruses lineage C, including MERS-CoV ( Zaki et al., 2012).
